description: Players are already reporting instances of cheating in Black Ops 7 beta, which went live on October 2. Clips of players aimboting and wallhacking are all over social media. Activision, however, has said its anti-cheat system, Richochet, is catching cheaters and banning them.
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 Beta Early Access Goes Live as Players Report Cheating

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 is heading into its second weekend, with deals across smartphones, smart TVs, home appliances, and more. Beyond mainstream gadgets, shoppers can also find personal care items like electric toothbrushes from Oral-B, Caresmith, and Agaro at discounted prices. Offering rapid bristle movements, these brushes clean tricky spots, reduce plaque, and improve gum health.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Top Deals on Electric Toothbrushes During the Great Indian Festival Sale

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 has entered its second week in India. The discount sale brings various offers on neckband style earphones. Brands like Sony, Realme and OnePlus are selling popular models at discounted rates in the ongoing sale. The discounts can also be clubbed with an additional 10 percent instant discount on SBI Cards. There are exchange offers and EMI offers as well.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: The Ultimate Deals on Wireless Neckband Earphones Like the OnePlus Bullets Z2 and Sony WI-C100

description: The Department of Consumer Affairs has launched an investigation into e-commerce platforms for allegedly imposing hidden charges on cash-on-delivery (COD) orders. These fees, often added during checkout, have triggered consumer complaints. Union Minister Pralhad Joshi called the practice a “dark pattern” that misleads and exploits buyers. The ministry is now scrutinizing these platforms and promises strict action to uphold transparency and protect consumer rights.
title: Department of Consumer Affairs to Probe E-Commerce Platforms Over Hidden Cash-on-Delivery Charges

description: OpenAI’s new iOS-only social media app is quickly gaining traction, letting users create AI-generated videos of themselves or others and share them publicly. The app builds on the popularity of short, vertical video formats with an AI twist. Rivals are also moving in—Meta recently introduced its Vibe feed, while Google found success with Gemini-powered “Nano Banana” trends.
title: OpenAI Does It Again: While Google and Meta Play Catch-Up, Sora 2 Changes the Game

description: The iOS 26 update, which started rolling out on September 15, introduced the new Liquid Glass design. The newly launched iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro, iPhone 17 Pro Max, and iPhone Air run the new operating system out of the box. Meanwhile, older iPhone models received the latest iOS version via an OTA update. Several users online, and Gadgets 360 staff, noticed that with iOS 26, their iPhone models started displaying a 'Slow Charger' prompt. We noticed that it only showed when the phone was charged with a USB Type-A to USB Type-C adaptor.
title: Why Your iPhone Says ‘Slow Charger’ After Installing Apple's iOS 26 Update, and How to Fix It

description: BSNL has soft launched Voice over Wi-Fi (VoWiFi) service for customers in west and south zone circles. The service allows users to make and receive voice calls using a Wi-Fi network instead of their mobile carrier's cellular network. The company has also launched its 4G services in Mumbai. It has also started offering eSIM services across India.
title: BSNL Finally Launches VoWiFi Service in West, South Zone Circles; 4G Services Rolled Out in Mumbai

description: The iPhone 17 series is reportedly seeing “stronger than expected” demand, according to a report on Thursday. Apple’s latest flagship lineup, featuring major upgrades and design changes, appears to be resonating with buyers ready to upgrade. However, the newly introduced iPhone Air has not matched the same momentum, with weaker market reception so far.
title: iPhone 17 Series Reportedly Witnessing Strong Demand, but the iPhone Air Lags Behind

description: OnePlus 15 will land in Chinese market soon. The handset is also teased to arrive in the global markets, but an exact launch date is still under wraps. Now a new leak suggests that the OnePlus 15 will go official on November 13 in global markets outside China. Company's upcoming OxygenOS 16 interface will integrate Google’s Gemini AI with the Plus Mind feature.
title: OnePlus 15 Global Launch Date Leaked; OxygenOS 16 to Offer Gemini AI Integration With Plus Mind Feature

description: Oppo Find X9 series, including a standard and a Pro model, is scheduled to debut in China on October 16. The standard Find X9 model was recently spotted on the Bureau of Indian Standards (BIS) website with the model number CPH2791, signalling its imminent launch in the country. However, now a tipster has shared that the above-mentioned model number belongs to the Oppo Find X9 Pro, while the standard model has a different model number.
title: Oppo Find X9 Series Could Launch in India, Thailand as Handsets Surface on Certification Websites

description: Ubisoft has launched its Tencent-backed subsidiary, Vantage Studios, which will handle the company's three biggest franchises. Vantage will be responsible for development and expansion of Assassin's Creed, Far Cry, Rainbow Six.
title: Ubisoft Launches Tencent-Backed Subsidiary, Vantage Studios, to Run Assassin's Creed, Far Cry, and Rainbow Six

description: Vivo X300 and Vivo X300 Pro are set to be unveiled in China on October 13. However, the company could also launch a new ‘Fan Edition’ model, dubbed Vivo X300 FE, soon, as the handset has allegedly been spotted on the EEC database in Europe with the model number V2537. On top of this, the battery capacity and the charging speed of the upcoming Vivo X300 and Vivo X300 Pro have leaked online.
title: Vivo X300, Vivo X300 Pro Battery Specifications Leaked; Vivo X300 FE Listed on EEC Certification Site

description: The Amazon Great Indian Festival sale is underway, and it offers lucrative discounts on a wide range of products across categories. Popular smart home devices, including smart bulbs, door locks, switches, and Alexa-enabled devices, are available for considerably lower prices than their usual market rates. Here are the best deals on smart home devices during the Amazon Great Indian Festival sale.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Best Deals on Smart Home Devices

description: Meta, the Mark Zuckerberg-led tech giant, has announced that interactions between a user and the company's AI chatbot will soon be used for showing recommended content and ads. Users will have the option to choose the accounts from which the said data will be collected. The change will come into effect by the end of 2026, and Meta will start notifying users from next week. Both voice and text-based interactions will be used for displaying ads and content.
title: Instagram, Facebook Will Soon Start Showing You Ads, Content Based on Your Meta AI Interactions

description: Apple reportedly shelved the development on its  lower-end version of the Vision Pro headset to prioritize smart glasses that could directly compete with Meta’s offerings. Apple Glasses is said to follow a different timeline for launch. There could be a longer gap between the announcement and actual availability of the device.
title: Apple's Smart Glasses Said to Be Available a Year After Launch, Lighter Vision Pro on Hold

description: Flipkart Festive Dhamaka Sale 2025 is set to begin on Saturday, the company revealed. Interestingly, the company concluded the Big Billion Days Sale 2025 recently. Customers will be able to get an instant 10 percent discount with the HDFC Bank credit and debit cards. Flipkart has also revealed the deals that buyers will be able to grab during the sale event. Phones like the iPhone 16, iPhone 16 Pro, iPhone 16 Pro Max, Samsung Galaxy S24 (Snapdragon), and more will be available at a relatively low price.
title: Flipkart Festive Dhamaka Sale 2025 With iPhone 16 Pro Under Rs. 90,000 to Begin Soon

description: Huawei Watch D2 arrived in India with1.82-inch AMOLED display and Bluetooth calling support. It has ECG and skin temperature sensors. It offers blood oxygen saturation (SpO2) rate and heart rate sensors. It offers an IP68-rated build. It is compatible with Android and iOS devices. It is claimed to provide up to seven days of battery life.
title: Huawei Watch D2 With Blood Pressure Tracking, Skin Temperature Monitoring Launched in India: Price, Features

description: Microsoft announced it was hiking the prices of Xbox Game Pass and revamping the game subscription service with new plans. The company introduced Essential and Premium plans to replace Core and Standard tiers, along with Game Pass Ultimate. The prices have been hiked globally, starting October 1.
title: Microsoft Hikes Xbox Game Pass Pricing, Introduces 'Upgraded' Plans: Check New Prices in India

description: Over a month after Elon Musk’s xAI sued OpenAI for anticompetitive behaviour and stealing trade secrets, the San Francisco-based firm has issued its first public response. On Thursday, it published court documents addressing the claims while seeking dismissal of the case. OpenAI also called Musk’s lawsuit a “harassment tactic” and accused him of bullying its employees.
title: OpenAI vs Elon Musk: Company Alleges Lawsuit is a 'Harassment Tactic'

description: Perplexity has rolled out its AI-powered Comet browser for all users, CEO Aravind Srinivas announced on Thursday. Previously limited to Perplexity Max subscribers and invite-only access, the browser is now open on Windows and Mac, with mobile apps in development. A key feature of the browser is the sidebar AI assistant, which can summarise content, analyse web pages, and perform agentic tasks.
title: Perplexity’s AI-Powered Comet Browser Is Now Available to All Users for Free

description: iQOO 15 and Vivo X300 Pro are scheduled to go official in China this month. Ahead of their debut, both handsets have been spotted certification website, which hints towards their launch in the Malaysian market as well. The iQOO 15 is listed with the model number I2501, while the Vivo handset has the model number V2514. We can expect more details to surface closer to the launch of both iQOO and Vivo handsets.
title: Vivo X300 Pro, iQOO 15 Reportedly Listed on SIRIM Certification Site Ahead of Imminent Global Debut

description: Artificial intelligence (AI) is steadily weaving into different aspects of society, with fresh applications emerging regularly. A new study has revealed that over 25 percent of external corporate communication and press releases were either written with AI chatbots or significantly edited using them. The highest jump in AI usage was seen in technology and business press releases, while traces were also found in LinkedIn job postings and even UN communications.
title: AI's Role in PR Is Skyrocketing, With 25% of Press Releases Now Machine-Generated, Study Finds

description: Apple is expected to introduce several new products at its October event. Reports suggest that the iPad Pro could be refreshed with an M5 chipset and a new portrait-facing camera. Meanwhile, an updated version of the Vision Pro headset, with an M5 SoC, could also be launched. Other expected introductions include AirTag 2, HomePod mini 2, and a new Apple TV 4K.
title: Apple October Event: Everything That Could Be Announced From iPad Pro M5, AirTag 2 to Updated Apple Vision Pro

description: Origin OS 6 is scheduled to be unveiled in China on October 10. Its debut in India is set for October 15. Ahead of its launch, the company has teased the design of its new user interface of the upcoming Android 16-based skin. The upcoming flagship phones, Vivo X300 Pro and Vivo X300, are expected to be the first handset lineup to run Origin OS 6 out of the box. Older Vivo and iQOO handsets could receive the new user interface via an OTA udpate.
title: Origin OS 6 Design Teased Ahead of October 10 Launch: Here’s What We Know So Far

description: Google has introduced new smart home devices powered by its Gemini for Home artificial intelligence (AI) assistant. As per the company, the updated Nest Cam Indoor (3rd gen), Nest Cam Outdoor (2nd gen) and Nest Doorbell (3rd gen) come with 2K HDR video capabilities, built-in intelligent alerts, and up to a 166-degree diagonal view. Meanwhile, the new Google Home Speaker is claimed to be built for more natural conversations, powered by Gemini. It has support for 360-degree audio, Google TV Streamer pairing, and more features.
title: Google Launches New Smart Home Speaker, Gemini-Powered Nest Cams and Doorbell With AI Capabilities

description: Ahead of the launch of iQOO 15 in China this month, the company has confirmed several key details about the handset. It will come with an IP68 +IP69 rating, safeguarding it against dust, submersion in water, and high-pressure water jets. Further, the handset is teased to have the new generation 3D ultrasonic fingerprint scanner with wet touch support for faster unlocking.
title: iQOO 15 Confirmed to Come With IP68+IP69 Dust and Water Resistance, Faster 3D Ultrasonic Fingerprint Scanner

description: Lava Agni 4 India launch timeline revealed. The official poster shared by Lava on its India website confirm that the Lava Agni 4 will launch in November. The exact launch date is still under wraps but the teaser image shared by the brand show the rear design of the soon-to-be-unveiled phone that aligns with the leak that surfaced earlier. It is shown in black colour option.
title: Lava Agni 4 India Launch Timeline, Design Teased: Expected Specifications, Features
